document.full_text: leonid d. kuchma was officially named on tuesday as a suspect in the 2000 murder of georgy gongadze, a prominent investigative journalist.
document.title: ex-president of ukraine is implicated in 2000 killing
lines_and_colors: leonid d. kuchma was officially named on tuesday as a suspect in the 2000 murder of georgy gongadze, a prominent investigative journalist.
